title: Windows 8.1 Nov2014 Update - x86 x64 - Hebrew (mult. editions)
description:
Windows 8.1 with Update (multiple editions) (x86) and (x64) (Hebrew)

Official MSDN ISO's - includes Nov2014 Update.

File Name: he_windows_8.1_with_update_x86_dvd_6051597.iso
Languages: Hebrew
SHA1: 24A238906F458F75BB2E7FF17F6076552265505C

File Name: he_windows_8.1_with_update_x64_dvd_6051487.iso

SHA1: 1E6465F8EBA701B62FDB0D8F1E6BD62F988F7835
forums.mydigitallife.info/threads/28669

Thanks to a whole bunch of people @ MDL for ISO, svf patches, etc.
Thanks to Cody and others for MTK.

Activation Instructions:
-If you are doing a clean install on a PC that came pre-installed with Windows 8, you can activate 8.1 using your OEM key. Just use a retail key below to install, and then when activating, change the key to your original OEM key. RW-Everything can retrieve your OEM key from the BIOS. (usually)
-If you are doing a clean install on a PC that came pre-installed with Windows 8.1, setup will auto-detect SLIC which is in BIOS; it will automatically activate with OEM key. (usually)
-If not using OEM key, use KMS key for installation (see below), and then use the Toolkit to activate.

Retail Keys: (use this for install if you have legal copy)
Core: 334NH-RXG76-64THK-C7CKG-D3VPT 
Professional: XHQ8N-C3MCJ-RQXB6-WCHYG-C9WKB 
Enterprise: MNDGV-M6PKV-DV4DR-CYY8X-2YRXH || FHQNR-XYXYC-8PMHT-TV4PH-DRQ3H

KMS Keys: (use this for MTK activation)
gvlkCore = M9Q9P-WNJJT-6PXPY-DWX8H-6XWKK
gvlkProfessional = GCRJD-8NW9H-F2CDX-CCM8D-9D6T9

To activate, run "Microsoft Toolkit", click the Windows icon, click "Activation" (on top), then click "Activate". If it doesn't work, click "EZ-Activator". Enjoy!

For support, check MDL forums (mydigitallife)
